name: AskRyanRoy
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Parenting is trial and error... unless you have a coach that is going through it all with you. Ryan Roy shares his wins and failures with his daily stories of being a parent. Each episode is 8-15 minutes long, so put this last in your flash briefing series so you have time to listen... because you WILL want to hear it all.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
